images.caption: Figure 1:Upper row:(a) CVP in a two-dimensional lattice; (b-c) The projection steps in Babai’s nearest plane algorithm without basis reduction; (d) Basis reduction can find a shorter, more orthogonal basis that can potentially improve the results.Lower row:rounding boundaries of (e) optimal rounding or Voronoi cells; (f) round-to-nearest (RTN); (g) Babai’s nearest plane algorithm without basis reduction; (h) Babai’s algorithm without basis reduction under reversed basis ordering.
